messages.subject: Piano Guy
messages.msgSnippet: My 12 yo discovered a Scott The Piano Guy Houston special on PBS today, and is still sitting in front on the piano in her pajamas :)  It s such a cool
messages.messageBody:
My 12 yo discovered a Scott "The Piano Guy" Houston
special on PBS today, and is still sitting in front on
the piano in her pajamas :) It's such a cool
unschool-y way to learn piano, that I just wanted to
pass it along in case you've missed it ;)
www.scotthouston.com There is a list of PBS stations
that he will be on, although he was on ours today and
it didn't list it....Anyway, she's picked out two
Christmas carols already, both hands, with no prior
experience!

Dana
